import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FiFilm, FiGrid, FiShare2, FiArrowRight, FiPlay, FiStar, FiHeart, FiAward, FiTrendingUp, FiCheck } from 'react-icons/fi'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: , title: "Smart Movie Tracking", description: "Intelligent tracking system for your entire movie collection with advanced categorization", color: "from-blue-500 to-blue-600" }, { icon: , title: "Advanced Organization", description: "Powerful tools to organize and filter your movies by multiple criteria", color: "from-purple-500 to-purple-600" }, { icon: , title: "Social Integration", description: "Share and discuss your movie collections with a growing community", color: "from-pink-500 to-pink-600" } ]; const popularMovies = [ { title: "Inception", year: 2010, rating: "9.2", genre: "Sci-Fi" }, { title: "The Dark Knight", year: 2008, rating: "9.5", genre: "Action" }, { title: "Interstellar", year: 2014, rating: "9.0", genre: "Adventure" } ]; const statistics = [ { number: "10K+", label: "Active Users" }, { number: "50K+", label: "Movies Tracked" }, { number: "100K+", label: "Reviews" } ]; return (
